articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Singapore begins vaccinating students to quell COVID-19 flareups as new variants wreak havoc elsewhere in Asia - ABC News
articles.description: As Singapore moves to inoculate younger people, a sharp rise in coronavirus cases blamed on new variants in other South-East Asian countries prompts new restrictions, factory closures and attempts to rapidly scale up vaccination programs across the region.
articles.content:
Singapore is moving to vaccinate students against COVID-19 after a spate of transmissions in schools and learning centres. 
Key points:

articles.title: Acer unveils the new Swift X ultrathin laptop - Digital News Asia
articles.description: During the recent Next@Acer global conference, Acer unveiled the latest inclusion in their line of ultrathin devices.
articles.content:

articles.title: Covid-19 vaccination booking for students to start on June 1: PM Lee - AsiaOne
articles.description: Students will now be next in line to get the Covid-19 vaccine, Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong announced today (May 31).Bookings will open tomorrow as Singapore "takes full advantage of the June holidays to vaccinate students," he said....

articles.title: Actor Kai Ko on his exes: 'The one I wanted to marry was Elva Hsiao, but the one I liked most was Tia Lee' - AsiaOne
